mapper.select: SELECT d.dog_name,d.dog_photo,de.designer_name,i.item_name,i.item_price,re.resv_no,re.resv_fix,DATE_FORMAT(sc.sc_date, CONCAT('%y','.','%m','.','%d',' | ','%H','시')) sc_date FROM resv re INNER JOIN dog d ON re.dog_id=d.dog_id INNER JOIN item i ON re.item_id=i.item_id INNER JOIN designer de ON re.designer_id=de.designer_id INNER JOIN schedule sc ON re.resv_no=sc.resv_no WHERE re.useremail=#{useremail} ORDER BY sc.sc_date desc

SELECT d.dog_name,d.dog_photo,de.designer_name,i.item_name,i.item_price,re.resv_no,DATE_FORMAT(sc.sc_date, CONCAT('%Y','년 ','%m','월 ','%d','일')) sc_date FROM resv re INNER JOIN dog d ON re.dog_id=d.dog_id INNER JOIN item i ON re.item_id=i.item_id INNER JOIN designer de ON re.designer_id=de.designer_id INNER JOIN schedule sc ON re.resv_no=sc.resv_no WHERE re.useremail=#{useremail} AND re.resv_fix=1 ORDER BY sc.sc_date desc
mapper.update: UPDATE resv SET resv_ask=#{resv_ask}, resv_fix=#{resv_fix} WHERE resv_no=#{resv_no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(res.resv_fix) resvcnt FROM resv res INNER JOIN user us ON us.useremail = res.useremail WHERE res.resv_fix = 1 and us.useremail=#{useremail}
